name: Hall 51
description:
Play as a vulnerable parasite and try to survive endless waves of aggression, by taking possession of robots and using their own weapons against them!

Crawl your way to safety, or face your ennemies head on with each increasingly difficult waves!

Unique classes with uniques weapons:

Hall 51 is a student project made within six weeks on Unreal Engine 5.

SPINEUX Adrien : Weapon design & modeling, rigging, animations, sound design.

SOARES Sébastien : Character design & modeling , animations, Niagara particles, UI.

DURAND Julien : Level design, materials & shaders, Niagara particles, blueprint integration.

DUPONCHEL Oscar : Coding

ULRICH Max-Pol : Coding
